    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_113224</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Enthalpy cycle for methane formation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Enthalpieschleife für Methananordnung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cycle d'enthalpie pour la formation de méthane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciclo do enthalpy para a formação do methane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciclo di entalpia per formazione del metano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κύκλος ενθαλπίας για το σχηματισμό μεθανίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciclo de la entalpia para la formación del 
metano</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the enthalpy cycle for the formation of methane. Hess's law states that enthalpy change for the two routes must be equal.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">combustion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">enthalpy change</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fuel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Hess's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">methane</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Enthalpieschleife für 
die Anordnung des Methans. Gesetz Hesss gibt an, daß 
Enthalpieänderung für die zwei Wege gleich sein muß.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le cycle d'enthalpie 
pour la formation du méthane. La loi de Hess déclare que le 
changement d'enthalpie pour les deux itinéraires doit être égal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o ciclo do enthalpy para
a formação do methane. A lei de Hess indica que a mudança do 
enthalpy para as duas rotas deve ser igual.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il ciclo di entalpia 
per la formazione di metano. La legge del Hess dichiara 
che il cambiamento di entalpia per i due itinerari deve essere uguale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει κύκλο ενθαλπίας για το 
σχηματισμό του μεθανίου. Ο νόμος του Hess δηλώνει ότι η 
αλλαγή ενθαλπίας για τις δύο διαδρομές πρέπει να είναι ίση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el ciclo de la entalpia
para la formación del metano. La ley de Hess indica que el 
cambio de la entalpia para las dos rutas debe ser igual.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
